transcript:
dissatisfied, but had no option but to reply in the same tone. 
"On the contrary," he said, in a querulous and angry tone that contrasted with his flatter- ing words, "on the contrary, your excellency's participation in the common action is highly valued by His Majesty; but we think the pres- ent delay is depriving the splendid Russian troops and their commander of the laurels they have been accustomed to win in their battles," he concluded his evidently prearranged sen- tence.
